summary: We know you’ve spent years working 24/7 to build your business into a profitable enterprise: the legacy of your vision, execution and leadership. Sooner or later you’ll be faced with the decision of what to do with your business when it’s time to exit.Whether you are ready to cash out now or wait a few more years, I can help you prepare so you can leave with maximum value. I offer valuations and assessments as part of my comprehensive planning and preparation process. Contact me today to get started on your path to finishing BIG!  Merle Makings | ☎ 602.739.8806 | mdmakings@cox.net | http://www.az-businessbrokers.com/_________________________________________________________________________ The decision to sell all or part of your business can be the most important decision of your life. Selling a business is a complex affair involving hundreds of variables. You face an uncertain economy, unbridled competition, sophisticated buyers and, without professional guidance, you face them alone.My confidential, creative, customized, strategic and proven approach to negotiations produces the results you need: - No upfront costs - I only get paid when you do - Confidential No Obligation Consultation - Expertise in packaging and marketing businesses for sale - Unique database of thousands of Private Equity and High-Wealth buyers - Ability to market businesses for sale with a shotgun or a laser - Bring qualified “ready, willing and able” buyers to the table, eliminate “tire kickers” - Relationships with lenders aggressively looking to do business acquisition loans - Success in finding buyers “Ideal Deal” - Creative negotiations to get deals done - Confidentiality: employees, vendors and competition will never know My experience, expertise and network will help you with a clear plan of action to sell your business for the maximum amount of money in your pocket.  Let’s talk about your goals today!You can reach me at : ✉ mdmakings@cox.net or ☎ 602.739.8806
